article.title: 1337x
article.text:

'''1337x''' is a website that provides a [[Web directory|directory]] of [[torrent file]]s and [[Magnet URI scheme|magnet links]] used for [[peer-to-peer file sharing]] through the [[BitTorrent]] protocol.<ref name=":0">{{Cite news|url=https://torrentfreak.com/torrent-site-1337x-hopes-new-design-will-prevent-search-engine-bans-161030/|title=Torrent Site 1337x Hopes New Design Will Prevent Search Engine Bans - TorrentFreak|date=2016-10-30|newspaper=TorrentFreak|language=en-US|access-date=2016-10-31}}</ref> According to the [[TorrentFreak]] news blog, 1337x is the third most popular torrent website as of 2018.<ref>{{Cite news|url=https://torrentfreak.com/top-10-most-popular-torrent-sites-of-2018-180107/|title=Top 10 Most Popular Torrent Sites of 2018 - TorrentFreak|date=2018-01-07|work=TorrentFreak|access-date=2018-06-23|language=en-US}}</ref>

== History ==
1337x was founded in 2007 and saw increasing popularity in 2016 after the closure of [[KickassTorrents]].<ref name=":0" /> In October 2016, it introduced a website redesign with new functionalities.<ref name=":0" /><ref name=":1">{{Cite news|url=http://www.techtimes.com/articles/184320/20161031/1337x-takes-on-the-pirate-bay-as-torrentz-and-kickass-torrents-alternative-unveils-new-site-design.htm|title=1337x Takes On The Pirate Bay As Torrentz And Kickass Torrents Alternative Unveils New Site Design|last=Times|first=Tech|date=2016-10-31|newspaper=Tech Times|access-date=2016-10-31}}</ref> The site is banned from [[Google]] search queries and does not appear when searching through [[Google Search|Google search]].<ref name=":0" /><ref name=":1" /> This action was taken following request by [[Feelgood Entertainment]] in 2015.<ref name=":0" /><ref>{{Cite web|url=https://www.lumendatabase.org/notices/1623131|title=DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google :: Notices :: Lumen|website=www.lumendatabase.org|access-date=2016-10-31}}</ref> In 2015 the site moved from its older .pl domain to .to, partly in order to evade the block.<ref name=":0" /><ref name=":1" /><ref>{{Cite news|url=https://torrentfreak.com/1337x-staff-abandon-insecure-torrent-site-start-over-151220/|title=1337x Staff Abandon "Insecure" Torrent Site, Start Over - TorrentFreak|date=2015-12-20|newspaper=TorrentFreak|language=en-US|access-date=2016-10-31}}</ref> 

It has been touted as an alternative to [[The Pirate Bay]] in face of its potential demise.<ref>{{Cite news|url=http://www.gamenguide.com/articles/56304/20161018/kickass-torrent-crisis-news-update-pirate-bay-kills-all-competitions-kickasstorrents-kat-torrentz-torrent-hound-no-more.htm|title=Kickass Torrent Crisis News & Update: Pirate Bay Kills All Competitions; KickassTorrents (KAT), Torrentz, Torrent Hound No More?|last=Guide|first=Game &|date=2016-10-18|newspaper=Gamenguide|access-date=2016-10-31}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web|url=http://www.universityherald.com/articles/45724/20161024/the-pirate-bay-alternatives-tpb-extra-torrent-yts-1337x-google-chrome-browser-mozilla-firefox.htm |title=The Pirate Bay Alternative: Google Hits TPB With A New Block [VIDEO]; See Top Three Alternatives |last=Patel |first=Vinay |date=24 October 2016 |website=www.universityherald.com |publisher= |archive-url=https://archive.is/20161025045047/http://www.universityherald.com/articles/45724/20161024/the-pirate-bay-alternatives-tpb-extra-torrent-yts-1337x-google-chrome-browser-mozilla-firefox.htm |archive-date=25 October 2016 |access-date=2016-10-31 |deadurl=yes |df= }}</ref><ref>{{Cite news|url=http://www.latinpost.com/articles/125482/20161026/pirate-bay-site.htm|title=The Pirate Bay has shut down, but users can try these alternatives|last=Post|first=Latin|date=2016-10-26|newspaper=Latin Post|access-date=2016-10-31}}</ref>
